snippet.title: Meteor 60 Seconds! Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam Link :
http://store.steampowered.com/app/788770/Meteor_60_Seconds/

IOS Link :
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/%EC%A7%80%EA%B5%AC%EB%A9%B8%EB%A7%9D-60%EC%B4%88%EC%A0%84/id1331351781?mt=8

Android Link:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AvoCavo.Apocalypse60

Meteor 60 seconds! is a simple, fun, comic-like side-scrolling action game which simulates your life in case you have only 60 seconds to live. Do you think that anything is ok that you want to do, even it is illegal? What about planting an apple tree?


Story

NASA recently stated that a massive meteorite will collide with Earth soon and that Earth will be destroyed!
Surprisingly, we all only have 60 seconds left to live before the earth is destroyed!
Which means YOU ONLY HAVE 60 SECONDS LEFT TO LIVE!!
What will your choice be...?


Features


-Simple, fun side-scrolling action game
-Comic-like story
-Multi Ending


Steam Link : http://store.steampowered.com/app/788770/Meteor_60_Seconds/
